summary: This module implements the infrastructure for handling UI components within Metaflow cards. It defines collectors and managers that store, validate, update, and serialize components, supports live refresh of component state, and provides utilities for rendering components and managing warning messages.
business_intent: To enable Metaflow workflows to generate interactive, dynamically updatable cards by managing component lifecycles and converting component data into a JSON format suitable for front‑end rendering, while handling warnings and ensuring component integrity.
